name: webdriverio-mocha-helper
description: Helper library for better webdriverio integration in mocha and additional helper method like feature detection and server versioning.

scripts.test: istanbul cover --report html --dir coverage/node --root src --include-all-sources node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha -- --color --require tools/babelhook tests/**/*.spec.js

author: Stefan Mayer <s.mayer@netconomy.net>
